title: Cover, 20th century
description: Square cover patterned by sewing down shapes of brightly colored cotton. Field has a square repeat of a tree, birds and a human figure. Inner border a repeat of leaf shapes. Outer border has a repeat of triangles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: appliqué. Gift of Faie J. Joyce. 1978-156-1.
